name: BuildPC
description: Building a PC can be exciting, but it also comes with challenges—choosing compatible parts, avoiding bottlenecks, and staying within budget. That’s where BuildPC comes in. Whether you're assembling a high-end gaming rig, a workstation for professional tasks, or a simple home office setup, BuildPC makes the process effortless.
